UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: A potent antibacterial activity of new short d-enantiomeric lipopeptide against multi drug resistant bacteria.
Literature.Author: Lee J, Kim S, Sim JY, Lee D, Kim HH, Hwang JS, Lee DG, Park ZY, Kim JI

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 1637(MIC=>80µM),Acinetobacter baumannii KCCM 40203(MIC=10µM),Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621(MIC=2.5µM),Enterococcus faecalis KCCM 11814(MIC=2.5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CCARM 2180(MIC=>80µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-1605(MIC=10µM),Staphylococcus aureus KCCM 40510(MIC=5µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 51575(MIC=5µM)
